author: Farkas Gabor
comment: I found this one the best note app on Google play for Android Wear. Very good app, no ads at all, simple to use, quick as hell. I especially like that the Android Wear note is automatically stored, even if I reboot my watch and disconnect it from the phone. The only thing I miss: the app would be even better if I could store multiple notes on my watch!

reply.author: Moblino
reply.content:
Thanks for your interest,

I'm planning to support multiple notes in the next release.

author: Richard Smith
comment: Finally! A useful app with no ads! It truly is simple, no frills, but does a very basic job well. Thanks!

author: Cori Boyd
comment: This is a terrible app. It said two times that it stopped and I losed all my hard work on there. This app is the worst. DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS. It's gonna waste your time so don't.
